name: Granting The Sybil's Sight
effect: As the Fate 1 "Sybil's Sight" spell, except that the mage casts this upon another mage, or even a supernatural being such as a ghost or werewolf. If this spell is cast upon a Sleeper, it invokes Disbelief immediately, even if its Duration is less than one scene. If the target is unwilling, he may contest with a reflexive Resolve + Gnosis roll.

rotes.roteDescription: It is not always sufficient to perceive Fate's nuances for oneself. On occasion, others must be made aware of destiny's pattern. Willworkers of the Mysterium developed this rote to impart such understanding upon those who would otherwise go blind to such intricacies.
